text: What about removing limits for blog listing functionalities? :thinking_face:  <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Blog-listing-why-there-is-a-limit/idc-p/411313#M75252>

It would be nice to have option to make link "Open in new a window" in the new Image/Link panel for blog posts.
(It is still possible to use "old panel", but It's hard to find TBH - you have to click somewhere outside the image but still on a link)
